name: The Sentinels (itch)
description:
This is an FPS game where you will be surrounded by Sentinels. Initially where designed and programmed to serve humans but, some how they have gone berserk. Your job is the destroy as many Sentinels as possible. This is an high scorer game so dying is inevitable. You will be given 10 sec of rest time after completing every layer/level. Total number of Sentinels = 5 * current Layer/Level. Hope you enjoy the game ;)

W,A,S,D to Walk, Left click to Shoot, Left Shift to fast Run, Space to Jump, Tab to change weapons (Pistol does more damage than Rifle).
